x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.description: If a Scripted REST API resource has 'requires_snc_internal_role' set to false, then keep it false, otherwise check 'requires_authentication' to determine its value as follows: If a Scripted REST API resource has 'requires_authentication' set to true, then set 'requires_snc_internal' to true. If a Scripted REST API resource has 'requires_authentication' set to false, then set 'requires_snc_internal' to false.
x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts.name: Set Requires SNC Internal field

sys_update_version.name: x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts_03a3b38483e89e50c6695855eeaad3ce
sys_update_version.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts"><x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>false</before><description>If a Scripted REST API resource has 'requires_snc_internal_role' set to false, then keep it false, otherwise check 'requires_authentication' to determine its value as follows: If a Scripted REST API resource has 'requires_authentication' set to true, then set 'requires_snc_internal' to true. If a Scripted REST API resource has 'requires_authentication' set to false, then set 'requires_snc_internal' to false.</description><name>Set Requires SNC Internal field</name><record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback><script/><sys_class_name>x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-05 14:54:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>03a3b38483e89e50c6695855eeaad3ce</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Requires SNC Internal field</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Now Utils" source="x_938076_now_utils">b208a7c083689e50c6695855eeaad3d2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Now Utils">b208a7c083689e50c6695855eeaad3d2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts_03a3b38483e89e50c6695855eeaad3ce</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-05 14:54:50</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></x_938076_now_utils_now_utils_fix_scripts></record_update>
